notes.title: Author contributions
notes.p: L.W. and Z.Z. participated in the design of the study, collected experimental data, carried out lab and statistical analyses. Z.Z. conceived, designed and coordinated the study, participated in lab and guided the allelopathy work. Y.L. and X.H.participated in the laboratory work and the collection of experimental data and X.Z. contributed to the writing of the paper. All authors reviewed and approved the final version of this manuscript.
